definitions.title: adv.
definitions.body: How? ([[היך]], huk, id., in Palest. Aram., as Job 21:34 Targum, Ge 3:9, De 1:12 Targum:Pa. J; Mt 22:12 SyrVer:Jerus. (though usu. these words have the force of as), and in [[הֵיכְדֵין]] how, then? Ps 73:11 + Targum; cf. Bevan:Dan.P. 29)—only twice, in late Heb., 1Ch 13:12 (‖ 2Sa 6:9 [[אֵיח]]), Da 10:17.
